thread.title: 8 Moments From Snoop Dogg’s Culinary History You Forgot About
thread.title_full: 8 Moments From Snoop Dogg’s Culinary History You Forgot About

author: Kyle Hodge
title: 8 Moments From Snoop Dogg’s Culinary History You Forgot About
text:
8 Moments From Snoop Dogg’s Culinary History You Forgot About Uncle Snoop has been cheffin' for a minute. by Kyle Hodge 2h ago 
Since 1993’s smash hit “Gin and Juice,” the world of food has been present in Snoop Dogg ’s long career. From being on countless cooking shows, to being fed ramen in the “Gangsta Luv” video, to starring in the hit show Martha & Snoop’s Potluck Dinner Party with co-star Martha Stewart on VH1 . As the show continues to feed us delicious dishes and hilarious moments for the second half of season 1, we’ve decided to celebrate Snoop’s extensive relationship with the culinary arts in the videos below. Giphy 
Watch Snoop’s uncle Rio stop by and get everyone in the groove with singing and recipes. Be sure to tune in to Martha & Snoop’s Potluck Dinner Party Monday nights at 10/9c.
